email.title: J.P. Morgan Asia Opportunities
email.text:
Hi everyone!
J.P. Morgan have reached out with details of their opportunities in Asia. If this is something which interests you, you can find their email below.

Hello,
We are excited to introduce our 2019 summer programs, which targets students who are graduating in September 2019 to summer of 2020.
**2019 Summer Internship Opportunities**
**Please submit your application by Sunday, 30 September, 2018 Hong Kong Time 11.59pm**
Summer Analyst – East Asia Coverage (HK/SG) [Apply](https://jpmchase.taleo.net/careersection/10140/jobdetail.ftl?job=180059255&lang=en&sns_id=mailto#.Wx-j5a3tJJc.mailto)
Summer Analyst – China Coverage (HK) [Apply](https://jpmchase.taleo.net/careersection/10140/jobdetail.ftl?job=180059260&lang=en&sns_id=mailto#.Wx-lfcztcBE.mailto)
Summer Associate – East Asia Coverage (HK/SG) [Apply](https://jpmchase.taleo.net/careersection/10140/jobdetail.ftl?job=180060910&lang=en&sns_id=mailto#.WyjEjC_bi-M.mailto)
Summer Associate – China Coverage (HK) [Apply](https://jpmchase.taleo.net/careersection/10140/jobdetail.ftl?job=180060911&lang=en&sns_id=mailto#.WyjE5VxKMgo.mailto)
**Markets**
Summer Analyst (HK/SG) [Apply](https://jpmchase.taleo.net/careersection/10140/jobdetail.ftl?job=180059259&lang=en&sns_id=mailto#.WynGZilhNZc.mailto)
Japan summer internship opportunities will open later this summer and application deadlines can be found on our [careers website](http://www.jpmorgan.com/careers).
**You Ask. We Answer. Networking – U.K.**
J.P. Morgan Asia will be visiting the U.K. to promote our career opportunities in Asia. This is your change to draw on your international experiences and bring the whole you to J.P. Morgan in Asia. In this session, you’ll get the chance to:
- Meet employees from across the firm - Find out what it’s like to work with us - Ask the questions you really want answered
**Join us on:** October 15, 2018 in London
[Apply](https://jpmc.recsolu.com/external/events/LJiMQtjP4SJxkOordXJ90g) by October 7, 2018
We look forward to meeting you.
The J.P. Morgan Campus Recruitment Team
